allow: Bash(# Check if there''s a .git directory backup or git config anywhere find /d/Projects -name "".git"" -type d)
Bash(# Check git global config for any remote URLs git config --global --list)
Bash(# Check for any git objects that might be recoverable find /d/Projects -name ""objects"" -type d)
Bash(# Check Windows shadow copies / restore points # And check if VSCode has any backups ls -la ""/c/Users/JRein/AppData/Roaming/Code/User/History/"")
Bash(# Search VSCode history for mercenary files find ""/c/Users/JRein/AppData/Roaming/Code/User/History/"" -name ""*.json"" -exec grep -l ""mercenary"" {} \\;)

Bash(# Check if there''s a remote repository configured in git global cat /c/Users/JRein/.gitconfig # Check for any GitHub CLI credentials that might indicate repos cat /c/Users/JRein/.config/gh/hosts.yml)
Bash(# Check GitHub for any mercenary repos under this user gh repo list jreinhal)
Bash(# Search entire D drive for any mercenary java files find /d -name ""MercenaryController.java"")
Bash(# Check if there''s a cloud sync folder ls -la ""/c/Users/JRein/OneDrive/"")
Bash(# Try different approach - check if Windows has System Restore # Also check for any file history wmic shadowcopy list brief)
Bash(# Search more thoroughly for mercenary source find /c/Users/JRein -name ""MercenaryController.java"")
Bash(# Check if there''s a git repo that might have mercenary as origin find /d -maxdepth 4 -name "".git"" -type d)
Bash(# Check if there''s any git repository anywhere on D drive find /d -maxdepth 5 -name "".git"" -type d)
Bash(# Check what was created find /d/Projects/mercenary/src/main/java -type f -name ""*.java"")
Bash(# Kill any existing Java processes taskkill /F /IM java.exe || echo ""No Java processes"" # Build the project cd /d/Projects/mercenary ./gradlew bootJar 2>&1)

Bash(# Check if gradle wrapper jar exists and try direct gradle call ls -la /d/Projects/mercenary/gradle/wrapper/ which gradle || echo ""gradle not in PATH"" # Try running gradle directly if available gradle -p /d/Projects/mercenary bootJar 2>&1)
Bash(# Check build directory for any output ls -la /d/Projects/mercenary/build/ ls -la /d/Projects/mercenary/build/classes/)
Bash(wmic process where "name like ''java%''" get processid,commandline)
Bash(wmic process where "commandline like ''%sentinel-government%''" get processid)
Bash(wmic process where "commandline like ''%sentinel%''" get processid,commandline)
Bash(wmic process where "commandline like ''%sentinel-government%''" get processid,commandline)
